𓎨 #hnt hinder/hinter 𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 𓏏 𓎨 > Ende 𓈋
𓎨 #ḫnt < con… 𓎨 bnt/knt •bant / •knot ⇔ contra !

⚠️ Careful ⚠ com > con… may just be a common prefix of a more complicated word.

However the following equivalence strongly suggests that it is really just one syllable 𓎨 ≈ #ḫˣnt
𓎛 𓎨 𓋓 𓏏 𓆊 | be covetous, greedy |
𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 𓏏 𓏮 𓎨 𓀜 | be covetous, greedy |

𓎛 𓎨 𓋓 𓏏 𓆊 ⇔ champsai Kantzahn Kermit 𓆎 𓆊 crocodile

𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 𓏏 𓎨 𓏛 𓏥 Kante rhymes with 𜒔 𓉺 𜑙 𓎨 𜑜 Band / Wand

𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 𓏏 𓎨 ᵈhemi demi semi "half" ?

𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 𓏏 𓎨 𓏛 𓏥 | craft | Kenntnis ⇔ Technic
